message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to save a bit of money.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $13,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500 is still a bit too high for me. How about we meet at $12,750?
